objects

Class VCSBlob

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.VCSObject
      • objects.AbstractVCSTree
        • objects.VCSBlob

  • public class VCSBlob
extends AbstractVCSTree
    Class representing file entity on disk. Note: File content is not stored in java object.All operations related to content are done using java.io.
    Author:
    warrior

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VCSBlob(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String workingDirectory)
      Creates instance form un hashed file which is stored on disk.
      VCSBlob(java.lang.String objectHash, java.lang.String workingDirectory, java.lang.String diskPath, java.lang.String name)
      Creates instance from hashed file which is stored on disk.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getContent()
      Deprecated.  
      java.lang.String hashContent(java.lang.String absoluteFilePath)
      Generates SHA256 hash of file content.
      java.lang.String printTree(int tab)
      Returns file name as string so that it can be printed in tree format.
      boolean writeObjectToDisk()
      Hashes and writes file content to disk on location ./vcs/objects/objecthash.
      boolean writeOriginalToDisk()
      Reads, decompresses hashed file content and writes it to location specified by the AbstractVCSTree.diskPath.

      • VCSBlob

        public VCSBlob(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String filePath,
               java.lang.String workingDirectory)
        Creates instance form un hashed file which is stored on disk. It generates SHA256 hash from the file content in the process.
        Parameters:
        name - AbstractVCSTree.name
        filePath - @see AbstractVCSTree.diskPath
        workingDirectory - @see VCSObject.workingDirectory
